descriptions:
Meet the Darkecho Comfort Chair (Purple) — a cozy, supportive chair for relaxing, reading, working, or even watching TV. It looks like a classic armchair, but adds gentle massage, easy adjustments, and strong safety features.

Easy comfort
- Soft seat and back: Thick 4.3-inch high-density foam cushions your hips and back.
- Gentle massage: A small pillow for your lower back plugs into USB and gives a soothing massage. Turn it on when you want, off when you don’t.
- Head pillow: Soft headrest you can move or remove.
- Footrest: Pull out the footrest when you want to put your feet up. Slide it back in when you’re done.

Simple to adjust
- Sit up or recline: Lean from upright (90°) to relaxed (up to 155°) for reading, TV, or a quick rest. Lock it where it feels best.
- Height adjusts: Raise or lower the seat so your feet rest flat on the floor.
- Armrests move: Up and down, right and left, to support your arms comfortably.
- Rocking: Gentle 15° rocking if you enjoy a little movement.
- Swivels 360°: Turn easily without straining.

Made to be sturdy and safe
- Strong metal frame and thick safety base.
- Five-point wheelbase that resists tipping.
- Wheels tested to roll long distances smoothly.
- Certified gas lift (SGS/BIFMA) for safe height changes.
- Supports up to 330 lb.

Soft, durable materials
- Premium PU leather that’s soft to the touch and easy to wipe clean.
- Beautiful hand-sewn diamond stitching.

Good for home or office
- Great for reading, computer time, phone calls, games, or simply putting your feet up.

Easy setup and helpful support
- Simple to assemble. Screws are pre-set to make it easier.
- Clear instructions included.
- One-month free return.
- Five-year free parts replacement.
- 24/7 customer service if you need help.

Quick use guide
- To recline: Pull the side lever, lean back to your comfy angle, then let go to lock.
- To raise/lower seat: Lift the small lever under the seat while sitting lightly or standing to adjust.
- To use massage: Plug the lumbar pillow’s USB into a power bank or USB port, press the button.
- To use the footrest: Pull it out under the seat, flip up the pad, and rest your legs.

If you want a chair that is soft, supportive, simple to use, and built to last, the Darkecho Comfort Chair is a gentle upgrade for your daily comfort.
